itunes:title: Buzzword Books
title: Buzzword Books
description:
In Episode 9 of Book Talk, Etc. Tina and Renee share books that have some of their favorite buzzwords! They share what they're loving lately, their latest read, a shelf addition, and have book talk about books that enticed them with buzzwords in their titles or descriptions.

*Time stamps with book images can be found in chapters on our website Booktalketc.com

Loving Lately
3:04 Allegro Organic Expresso Sierra Coffee
6:52 Stardew ValleyÂ 

Latest Reads
11:20 Project Hail Mary | Andy Weir
The Martian | Andy Weir
14:19 The Sacrifice of Lester Yates | Robin Yocum
Favorite sons | Robin Yocum(mentioned)
A Brilliant Death | Robin Yocum
The Midnight Library |Matt Haig

18:18 Book Talk
27:55 Mona at Sea | Elizabeth Gonzales James
31:43 The 22 Murders of Madison May |Max Berry
Dark Matter | Blake Crouch
36:42 The Girls are All So Nice Here | Laurie Elizabeth Flynn
40:20 The Last Act | Brad Parks
44:24 The Arrangement | Robyn Harding
The Perfect Family |
47:17 American Radical: Inside the World of an Undercover Muslim FBI agent | Tamer Elnoury
52:32 Pretty Things | Janelle Brown
Tina's Second Year Spoiler Chat with Janelle Brown
55:12 Two Truths and a Lie | Meg Mitchell Moore

Shelf Additions
59:13 The Stolen Hours | Allen Eskins
Nothing More Dangerous |Â  (mentioned)
The Life We Bury |Â  (mentioned)
1:00:59 True Crime Story | Joseph Knox
I'll Be Gone in the Dark | Michelle McNamarraÂ 

Listener Rec from Jennifer
1:05:26 Songs in Ursa Major | Emma Brodie

Other mentions
Bones Coffee
Nutpods
Article about video game benefits

*The book titles listed are linked to Amazon Affiliates, where we make a small commission from qualifying purchases. Thanks for your support!

Another way to supportÂ  us is through Buy Me a Coffee! This helps us with the costs
